response.overview: 'KARMA ' is a compelling thriller that masterfully employs the hyperlink cinema style, weaving together dispoarate narrative threads to create a complex and suspenseful whole. At the heart of the film is a charismatic yet enigmatic figure, a financial fraudster who operates under multiple aliases, most notably Ajayan& Benny, this character's life is a web of deceit and manipulation and the film meticulously unrevels five pivotal incidents that shapes his destiny.
response.title: Karthavu Kriya Karmam
